RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: isHeader
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Is this a header line containing summarized data about a material

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: commentToExecution
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Comment to execution, e.g. in case of rework.

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: batchID
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Batch ID of the produced sublot

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: definedPackingLevels
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: User input values for each defined packing level

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: sublotLevelQty
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Sublot level for creating sublots and label print for with packing levels; quantity per one sublot for no packing levels;

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: logisticUnitLevelQty
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Not allowing creation of more sublots at once than for one LU

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: Result
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: CONTINUE: The value is CONTINUE if phase was completed with the Continue option button. DONE: The value is DONE if phase was completed with the Done option button.

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: isSummaryData
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Is this data belongs to Summary grid or instace grid of material
